2016 usas pela wibhagaye daththa anuwa, sinhala wishayayata pasu wadima ayadumkaruwan sankhyawak muhuna dena prashna pathraya wanne rasayana widyawa, namuth lankawe pandurakata payin gahuwama 20 k withara wisiwena rasayana widya tiyushan guruwarun athare bedila yana me sisunge danuma thawamath ihala mattamaka naha.

krushi aarthika ratawata anugathawu nishpadana ratawan osse godanagunu saradharma, kalashilpa, aadi jiwana pa්rawruthiyehi sama anshayakma sakasune, hikmawuye goda ha mada gowithana pa්ramukha krushi aarthikayak magini. 19 wani siyawase sita 20 wani siyawase mula wana wita parampara gatha wenas kam murthimath wemin yatath wijitha upaka්rama thula samajaya pahadili wenasakata peralima sidu wiya. 1948 n pasu nawa muunuwarak gath samajaya elambaenuye, (1977 pamana wana wita* mathdrawya, podu depala sura kama aadi ka්rama bhawithawan magin diyunuwa apeksha kala samajayaki.

aanduwa wisin palanaya karanu labana mahajana depala wana jathika rupawahiniya, swadhina rupawahiniya (ayi.ti.en) ha lek hawus puwathpath samagama janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha pamanak mema janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wana ekama apekshakaya lesa huwa dakwima gana wipakshaya pasugiya kalaya purama dadi wirodhathawayak idiripath kaleya.

hari api dan mathrukawata bahimu.kuliyak nogenama anunge puka kasima.tikak nemeyi godak jugupsa janaka wadak.eeth ithin kisima ganak nathiwa oya yasa ageta koranneya.amarikawa loke balawathma rata wenna athi,eegananam mama hariyata kiyanna dan na, eeth apita wada nam gawganak issarahin inna ratak,athithaya purama un karapu hama dema hariya,un waradi karalama nathiya,eewa gana katha kirimata kawuruwath idiripath wanneda nathiya,namuth anik ratawalata(api wage tharad wa්rald) padayak giyada dum parikshawata mulinma hossa obanneda okunmaya, irakaya,afganisthanaya,libiyawa,wiyatnamaya,wage ratawal walata amarikawa giye mal paththi dannaya.ema nisa ema ratawala kisima manawa himikam ullanganayak siduwi nathiya, amarikawa methek kal loka bawalatha widiyata kare anik ratawala puka kasimaya,namuth sama awasthawakama amarikawata gu naganimata siduwiya.warthamanayeda lankawe puka kasimata aamarikawa mahath onakamin bala idi.anunge gu kame uuru prathipaththiya aamarikawata thama epawi natha.apitada kalahaki yamak natha.maknisada yath owun loka bawalathunya.tharsthawadaya yanu amarikawata witaka thalagoyeki witaka kabareki.kese ho mewan wal buru wadawalata erehiwa yam balawegayak idiriyedi athi nowuna hoth apitada badu banis wanu atha....
